static.description: Four-bed detached house in a cul-de-sac just outside Reading. Main home.

timeline.citation: [00:03:54] CLIENT2: The last one on our street went for about five‑eighty. Ours is a bit nicer—we’ve done the kitchen—so somewhere high five hundreds, maybe six hundred.
[00:04:07] CLIENT1: Around three‑twenty, three‑thirty. We’ve not made a massive dent yet.
[00:04:14] CLIENT2: Yeah. We wanted it actually going down, not interest‑only.
[00:04:20] CLIENT1: Contractual’s about fifteen‑hundred and something, and we’ve set a little overpayment so it ends up just under sixteen hundred.
[00:04:34] CLIENT1: Yeah, five‑year fix we did spring 2022. It’s three‑point‑something. Three‑point‑four, I think.

static.description: Two-bed flat in Croydon, jointly owned by James and his ex-wife. Buy-to-let.

timeline.citation: [00:05:58] CLIENT1: Yeah. That one’s on an interest‑only buy‑to‑let deal. Outstanding is around one‑seventy, one‑eighty.
[00:05:58] CLIENT1: Yeah. That one’s on an interest‑only buy‑to‑let deal.
[00:06:08] CLIENT1: About six hundred and something. Six‑ten, six‑twenty once the bits they bundle in are added.
